abs.name: The Stary night
abs.description: This Dutch post-impressionist painter is the man behind the magnificent oil painting, The Starry Night, Sunflower and Irises.

abs.name: Monalisa
abs.description: Regarded as one of the greatest artists of all time, he is well known for his two remarkable paintings: The Mona Lisa and The Last Supper.

abs.name: The Night Watch
abs.description: Known as the “Dutch Master”, he is considered one of the greatest visual artists in the history of art. His famous masterpieces include The Night Watch and The Return of the Prodigal Son.

abs.name: The Sculpture
abs.description: This triple threat is a painter, a sculptor and an architect, renowned for his epic ceiling mural on the Sistine Chapel, the David and Pietà and St. Peter’s Basilica in Rome.

abs.name: The Weeping Woman
abs.description: A child prodigy, he finished his first painting, The Picador at just 9 years old! His most popular paintings were Guernica, Les Demoiselles d'Avignon and The Weeping Woman.
